name: Fort Alice
features: Built in 1864 after the Brooke Rajahs' victory over Iban warrior Rentap, now a museum preserving colonial relics and history.
address: Jalan Fort Alice, 95000 Sri Aman, Sarawak

name: Batang Lupar River & Tidal Bore (Pesta Benak)
features: Famous for the tidal bore phenomenon and the annual Pesta Benak festival with cultural events.
address: Sri Aman Waterfront, 95000 Sri Aman, Sarawak
businessHours: Accessible at all times; tidal bore timings vary

name: Batang Ai National Park
features: Lush rainforest with orangutans and hornbills, featuring an artificial lake and access to longhouses by boat.

name: Masjid Bandar Sri Aman
features: A central mosque with serene ambiance and distinct Islamic architecture.
businessHours: Open for prayer times; visitors welcome outside prayer hours

name: Taman Panorama Benak
features: Park with scenic river views, walkways, and a relaxing environment to observe tidal bore waves.
address: Jalan Taman Panorama, 95000 Sri Aman, Sarawak

name: Sri Aman Waterfront
features: A riverside promenade ideal for relaxing walks and tidal bore watching along Batang Lupar River.

name: Sri Aman Sports Complex
features: Public sports facility with stadium and fields for recreation and community events.

name: Chinese Temple (unnamed)
features: Riverside temple known for its cultural heritage, festivals, and beautiful architecture.
address: Along Batang Lupar River, 95000 Sri Aman, Sarawak

name: Iban Longhouse Tours
features: Experience traditional Iban culture with guided visits to longhouses including food, crafts, and hospitality.
address: Accessible via Batang Ai National Park
businessHours: Tours typically arranged during daylight hours
